Hi Ben - 

My personal favourite is the Sengoku Jidai - whilst this era saw the
samurai ethos reach its lowest ebb, it also saw the emergence 
and development of some of the foremost martial ryu and also 
some of the most 'colourful' names in samurai history.

Thomas
